title: Shiny Black Slab
summaries: The Shiny Black Slab was a pet-summoning item that spawned an Android. It was obtainable from Chests in the surface layer, but only on the [img:Google Play] Google Play version. It was obtainable on other mobile devices via trading.
This item was removed alongside all other mobile-exclusive content in the Mobile 1.3.0.7 update.
Players on [img:Windows Phone] Windows Phone who acquired the Shiny Black Slab via trading continue to have access to it.
